title: Actually got 14 day banned for this game.
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/647a278a49776cc8dff90bf3504d83e4.png

Legit had the most kills on my team and get 14 day banned.

?

replies.body:
I'm probably falling for some sort of troll here..
But why would getting kills make you immune to player behaviour discipline?

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=pIi9HYjR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-03-19T05:54:27.089+0000)
>
> I'm probably falling for some sort of troll here..
> But why would getting kills make you immune to player behaviour discipline?

Because I had kills and no one else did because they were trolls. Legit 1v9 game. Brand legit inted at the start of the game, blamed me, and then griefed and watched me die.
24 deaths in a 31 minute game... yeah mate, how did you get banned, it's a mystery.

> [{quoted}](name=CyanPhoenix,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=pIi9HYjR,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-03-19T07:42:10.497+0000)
>
> 24 deaths in a 31 minute game... yeah mate, how did you get banned, it's a mystery.

The enemy team was just too damn good. Better players than me.
